initialDisplayPosts.title: InfoSec architect 101-Service account from prehistory
initialDisplayPosts.summary: Service accounts may sound boring, but they’re the unsung heroes of secure automation. In this post, we time-travel back to the prehistoric age of Windows domains to see how service accounts and Kerberos work together to avoid hardcoded passwords and security nightmares.

initialDisplayPosts.title: Terraform and Cybersecurity: A Chill Intro
initialDisplayPosts.summary: An old-timer's take on why managing cloud infrastructure by hand is a security nightmare, and how Terraform (and its cool cousin, OpenTofu) can save your bacon.
